GetRecord.description: Collection get record by record id

scripts.title: Render PDF
scripts.code:
<?php

use GuzzleHttp\Client;
use GuzzleHttp\Psr7\Request;

$api_token = getenv('API_TOKEN');
$client = new Client([
    'base_uri' => getenv('HOST_URL'),
    'verify' => false,
    'defaults' => [
        'verify' => false,
        'headers' => [
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer ' . getenv('API_TOKEN'),
        ],
    ],
]);

// Get the selected screen to render
$screen_id = $config['screenRef'];

// POST the screen to generate PDF
$postData = [
    'config' => $config,
    'data' => $data,
];

$response = $client->post('/api/1.0/connector-pdf-print/generatePdf/' . $screen_id . '/' . $data['_request']['id'],
    [
        GuzzleHttp\RequestOptions::JSON => $postData,
    ]
);

if ($response->getStatusCode() != 200) {
    throw new \Exception('Error posting message: ' . $response->getBody());
}

$data = json_decode($response->getBody()->getContents());

return $data->data;
